TopicTitle: New PC - how high should I reach?

Articles.Content:
To have fun for a while - my Core2Duo survived with one graphics card update since 2008 until now - should it be

i7 and GTX980 with 16GB RAM ~1.700 EUR

or would

i5 and GTX960/4GB with 8GB RAM ~1.000 EUR

be sufficient?
The I5 should be enough... unless it's a laptop. I7 is usually an overkill, even for gaming.
The PC I built in 2012 has Core i5 3570K and a Radeon HD 7950 and I still max out most games at 1080p.

The power of the GTX 960 is quite bad for its price (at least here in germany), you could get almost a R9 290 for that money which is way more powerfull.

An i5 is allways enough for gaming if you dont need the extra lanes of a X99 chipset.
